qa.name: Alex
qa.appearance: Rugged, with a backpack and a flashlight
qa.clothing: Khaki pants and a weathered jacket

hf.name: Sophie
hf.appearance: Slender, with glasses and a notepad

tr.name: Old Man Jenkins
tr.clothing: Tattered overalls and a worn cap

json_to_edit.voice_over: Little did they know, the crumbling walls held secrets beyond their wildest dreams.
json_to_edit.description: A group of explorers stumble upon an abandoned Victorian mansion, uncovering a hidden treasure.
json_to_edit.name: Hidden Treasure Revelation
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Explorers discover a hidden treasure in an abandoned house, guided by supernatural forces.

qa.action: Moonlit exterior of a dilapidated Victorian mansion, surrounded by overgrown vegetation.

hf.action: Alex and Sophie cautiously enter the foyer, flashlights scanning the dusty interior.

tr.action: Old Man Jenkins emerges from the shadows, startling the explorers with cryptic warnings.

xc.action: Sophie's eyes widen as she notices an unusual pattern in the wallpaper.

ka.action: The camera follows Alex's hand as he peels back the wallpaper, revealing a hidden map.

fn.action: The group pushes aside a heavy bookcase, uncovering a secret passage.

af.action: From Alex's perspective, descending a narrow, winding staircase into darkness.

qo.action: The ghost of Lady Elizabeth appears, pointing towards a specific spot on the wall.

fp.action: A hidden compartment opens, revealing a dazzling array of jewels and gold coins.

edit_command: Remove every second shot from the scene, but don't change anything else.

label.rationale: we will remove every second shot from the scene as requested, while keeping all other elements of the json intact. this means we'll remove shots with keys "hf", "xc", "fn", and "qo". we'll update the "list_display_order" accordingly and adjust the "number_of_shots" from 9 to 5. the remaining shots will maintain their original content and order.
